triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the core technology used to enable translation from natural language to temporal logics.

triples.name: Temporal logic
triples.relevance: Temporal logics are the target formal specification language for the translation framework.

triples.name: Formal specification
triples.relevance: Formal specifications are the type of rigorous formalization that nl2spec helps generate from natural language.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is the application domain where rigorous formal specifications derived by nl2spec are essential.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Natural language processing is the core technique for understanding and processing the unstructured natural language input.

triples.name: Machine translation
triples.relevance: The nl2spec framework performs machine translation from natural language to formal specification languages.

triples.name: User research
triples.relevance: A user study was conducted and used to create a challenging dataset for evaluating translation quality.
